attributes.action: Petition the South African Govt to stop the mass rape & murder of white farmers.
attributes.additional_details:
Bronwen Manby (August 2001). Unequal Protection – The State Response to Violent Crime on South African Farms. Human Rights Watch. ISBN 1-56432-263-7.

McDougall, Dan (28 March 2010). "Wealthy farmers being subject to conditions of genocide". The Times. London.

Gcina Ntsaluba (29 April 2008). "Anti-Farmer hate speech slated". news24.com.

Bronwen Manby (2002), "A Failure of Rural Protection", Transformation (49): 92–94, ISSN 0258-7696

Claasen, Lorrain (26 April 2017). "Farm Attacks and Farm Murders in South Africa" Source: Transvaal Agricultural Union & Afriforum.
attributes.background: The murder rate of these farmers is 4x that of the rest of the SA population. The SA govt is complicit in these horrific crimes with their inaction to stop this genocide. These white farmers are but a scapegoat for the govt. All asylum seekers from these communities should be considered by the UK.
